body:
Hi all,

I am trying to use the following command to create direct sun coefficient
matrix, but I get this error : "reinsrc.cal: cannot open"


$ cnt 5185 | rcalc -e MF:6 -f reinsrc.cal -e Rbin=recno \

-o 'solar source sun 0 0 4 ${ Dx } ${ Dy } ${ Dz } 0.533' >> skies/suns.rad


I copied reinsrc.cal from ray/src/cal/cal to ray/lib, but I still get the
error.
Can you please guide me on how to fix this.

Leyla
